name: $provider
desc: The data for the immunization event originated with a written record for the patient.

name: $record
desc: The data for the immunization event originated from the recollection of the patient or parent/guardian of the patient.

name: $school
desc: The data for the immunization event originated with an immunization information system (IIS) or registry operating within the jurisdiction.
